dataSet.name: DataSet1

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN AccountAccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense)) THEN AmountRCTurnoverDr ELSE AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceDr END

CASE WHEN AccountAccountType IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense)) THEN AmountRCTurnoverCr ELSE AmountRCClosingSplittedBalanceCr END

parameter.name: BeginOfFiscalYear
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN MONTH(&Period.EndDate) >= Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() THEN DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 1) ELSE DATEADD(DATEADD(DATETIME(1, 1, 1), "MONTH", Constants.FirstMonthOfFiscalYear.Get() - 1), "YEAR", YEAR(&Period.EndDate) - 2) END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END

parameter.dcsat:name: Indent
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 1 THEN "" WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 2 THEN " " WHEN SystemFields.LevelInGroup = 3 THEN " " ELSE " " END
